description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的消防救援机构，由原安徽省公安消防总队改制而来，隶属于国家综合性消防救援队伍，由中华人民共和国应急管理部与安徽省人民政府双重领导，承担火灾扑救、消防监督、抢险救援等职责。
description.en: The fire and rescue agency of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China. It was reformed from the former Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps and is part of the national comprehensive fire and rescue force. It is under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Emergency Management and the Anhui Provincial People's Government, responsible for firefighting, fire supervision, and emergency rescue.

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队安徽省总队消防处

description.zh-cn: 安徽省消防救援总队的前身。1965年成立，1983年纳入中国人民武装警察部队序列，2018年根据国家机构改革方案退出现役、移交应急管理部。
description.en: The predecessor of the Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps. Established in 1965, it was incorporated into the Chinese People's Armed Police Force in 1983. In 2018, it was decommissioned from active service and transferred to the Ministry of Emergency Management according to the national institutional reform plan.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部
en: Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 负责管理和指导中国国家综合性消防救援队伍的国务院组成部门。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council responsible for managing and guiding China's national comprehensive fire and rescue force.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国应急管理部管理的国家局，负责管理国家综合性消防救援队伍。
description.en: A national bureau administered by the Ministry of Emergency Management of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing the national comprehensive fire and rescue force.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省消防救援总队总队长，高级指挥长衔。
description.en: Chief of the Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps, holding the rank of Senior Commander.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省消防救援总队政治委员，高级指挥长衔。
description.en: Political Commissar of the Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps, holding the rank of Senior Commander.

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽省公安消防总队总队长。
description.en: Former Chief of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps.

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽省公安消防总队政治委员。
description.en: Former Political Commissar of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps.

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽省公安消防总队政治委员。
description.en: Former Political Commissar of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps.

description.zh-cn: 曾任安徽省公安消防总队和安徽省消防救援总队政治委员。
description.en: Former Political Commissar of both the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps and the Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps.

nodes.id: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

zh-cn: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 2018年由中共中央印发的指导性文件，内容包括将公安消防部队划归应急管理部。
description.en: A guiding document issued by the Central Committee of the CPC in 2018, which included the transfer of the public security fire fighting forces to the Ministry of Emergency Management.

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于中华人民共和国公安部和中国人民武装警察部队的消防队伍，2018年集体退出现役，成建制划归应急管理部。
description.en: The fire fighting force formerly affiliated with the Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China and the Chinese People's Armed Police Force. In 2018, they collectively retired from active service and were transferred to the Ministry of Emergency Management as complete units.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一场政治运动，期间安徽省公安厅消防处被撤销，消防队伍受到冲击。
description.en: A political movement in China, during which the Fire Department of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Department was abolished and the fire fighting force was impacted.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家武装力量的组成部分。安徽省公安消防总队曾于1983年至2018年隶属其序列。
description.en: A component of the armed forces of the People's Republic of China. The Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps was part of its structure from 1983 to 2018.

nodes.id: 关于公安消防民警实行义务兵役制有关问题的联合通告

zh-cn: 关于公安消防民警实行义务兵役制有关问题的联合通告

description.zh-cn: 1965年发布的文件，要求公安消防民警实行义务兵役制，促成了安徽省公安消防总队的建立。
description.en: A document issued in 1965 requiring public security fire police to implement a conscription system, which led to the establishment of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps.

nodes.id: 马鞍山市消防救援支队

zh-cn: 马鞍山市消防救援支队

nodes.id: 安徽省消防救援总队训练与战勤保障支队

zh-cn: 安徽省消防救援总队训练与战勤保障支队

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 安徽省消防救援总队由中华人民共和国应急管理部与安徽省人民政府双重领导。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps is under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Emergency Management and the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省消防救援总队由中华人民共和国应急管理部与安徽省人民政府双重领导。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps is under the dual leadership of the Ministry of Emergency Management and the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 国家消防救援局是安徽省消防救援总队的上级领导机关。
description.en: The National Fire and Rescue Administration is the superior leading authority of the Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国应急管理部

description.zh-cn: 根据《深化党和国家机构改革方案》，原公安消防部队成建制划归应急管理部。
description.en: According to the 'Plan for Deepening the Reform of Party and State Institutions', the former public security fire fighting forces were transferred to the Ministry of Emergency Management as complete units.

relationships.target: 中国人民武装警察部队

description.zh-cn: 1983年1月，安徽省消防部队纳入武警序列。
description.en: In January 1983, the Anhui provincial fire fighting force was incorporated into the People's Armed Police.

relationships.source: 深化党和国家机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 该方案的实施促使原公安消防部队退出现役并改制为国家综合性消防救援队伍，从而成立了安徽省消防救援总队。
description.en: The implementation of this plan prompted the former public security fire fighting forces to decommission from active service and reorganize into the national comprehensive fire and rescue force, leading to the establishment of the Anhui Provincial Fire and Rescue Corps.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，安徽省公安厅消防处（安徽省公安消防总队前身）于1967年被撤销，直至1975年才恢复设立。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the Fire Department of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Department (predecessor of the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps) was abolished in 1967 and was not re-established until 1975.

relationships.source: 关于公安消防民警实行义务兵役制有关问题的联合通告

description.zh-cn: 该通告要求公安消防民警实行义务兵役制，促使安徽省公安厅成立消防处（又称安徽省公安消防总队）。
description.en: This circular required public security fire police to implement a conscription system, which prompted the Anhui Provincial Public Security Department to establish a fire department (also known as the Anhui Provincial Public Security Fire Fighting Corps).

relationships.source: 马鞍山市消防救援支队
安徽省消防救援总队训练与战勤保障支队
